reviewText: His 2 best movies, Under Siege 1 & 2, make this an awesome collection by themselves even if they were paired with his 2 worst. But to include his debut, Above The Law, which was action packed and Hard To Kill which was my first Segal flick and I believe it was his 2nd movie which was just as action packed. He more recent movies have seemed like he was bored making them and some of the action was lacking (I haven't seen Exit Wonds yet) but these 4 are probably his 4 best (Marked For Death was good also).I would reccommend this to any Segal fan.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Thank god for the likes of Steven Seagal and Van Damme, The only Action Stars who haven't tried to "prove" themselves in Comedy or Drama. And this Pack proves that Steve has what it takes to make his No.1 in the Action position. Ill reveiw each film on its own merits. ABOVE THE LAW... 3  Stars Stevens first and worst. good action scenes, only they are too few  and far between. it also contains some of the most uninventive and stupid  bad guys put on film. HARD TO KILL... 4 Stars Stevens best acting to date.  His family are killed and he is put into acoma. And (of course) he seeks  revenge. William Sadler makes a top-notch baddie UNDER SEIGE... 5 Stars  (also know as "Die hard on a Battleship") The film that cemented  his stardom. There is something in this movie for all action fans. (all  self-respecting action fans would have seen it by now.) UNDER SEIGE 2... 5  Stars A rare sequal that lives up to the original. Great action, great cast  and great plot. Casey Kyback is back with a Vengence.

reviewText: Tough-minded, super confident, serious: That's the Seagal Iwant to see.  His best movie in my opinion?  "Glimmer Man."Now you see him, now you don't, then you're dead. A formerNavy Seal? A former CIA agent? Who is this guy? Audiencesalways benefit when not too much is revealed about a largerthan life hero.Russian terrorists are attempting to smuggle in chemicalweapons. Detective Keenan Ivory Wayans is sure Seagalwill get him killed. He has already been beaten-up, shot,blown up, and thrown through two windows

reviewText: If you want to get your Seagal fix this is the best and cheapest way to get five of his films on blu ray (you'd only need to buy Marked for Death and Out for Justice and you'd have the big 7). They are in two BR cases inside a slip cover so they take up a bit less space than 5 separate discs would.  From the shockingly great and out of nowhere "Above the Law" or "NICO" as it's called here , through the two Under Siege flicks, Hard To Kill with one time wife and one time hottie Kelly LeBrock , to the potentially even more shocking "Executive Decision" you get a real slab of early (and speaking of shelf space much thinner) Seagal.Although this is a foreign edition , it is all region and plays fine in my US BR player.
summary: the best Seagal movies at the best price.... 5 Stars!
